name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
summary: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.
description:
You can parry attacks against you with your weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirements.Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler) Leads To...

Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
